price: Mola wao Mlezi anawabashiria rehema zitokazo kwake, na radhi, na Bustani ambazo humo watapata neema za kudumu.
arabic: يُبَشِّرُهُمۡ رَبُّهُم بِرَحۡمَةٖ مِّنۡهُ وَرِضۡوَٰنٖ وَجَنَّٰتٖ لَّهُمۡ فِيهَا نَعِيمٞ مُّقِيمٌ
footnotes: Na hao Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu anawabashiria rehema kunjufu itakayo waenea, na atawakhusisha radhi zake, na hayo ndiyo malipo makuu. Na Siku ya Kiyama atawatia katika Mabustani, na humo watapata neema zenye kuthibiti na kudumu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yubashiruhum rabbuhum biraḥmatin min'hu wariḍ'wānin wajannātin lahum fīhā naʿīmun muqīmun
translations: Their Lord gives them glad tidings
Their Lord gives them glad tidings
